        • pycheron.util.getSta

    pycheron.util.getSta¶

    getSta(st, sta)[source]¶

    Obtain all traces in a stream that match a specified station

    Parameters:
    • st (obspy.core.stream.Stream) – Obspy stream object
    • sta (str) – Name of station, e.g., SP06, CABN
    Returns:

    Returns a new stream object containing the specific trace(s) of the specified station
    Return type:

    obspy.core.stream.Stream
    getStationName(snclq)[source]¶

    Extracts the station name from a SNCLQ id :param snclq: snclq id :type snclq: str

    Returns:The name of the station
    Return type:str
    getUniqSta(st)[source]¶

    Obtain unique station information within a stream object

    Parameters:st (obspy.core.stream.Stream) – Obspy stream object
    Returns:Returns a list of unique stations from the input stream object
    Return type:list
